snippet.title: Tiny Cafe: Cooking Game - Android Gameplay
snippet.description:
☕ Run your own cafe for free!
Open and run a cafe with Dolce, the world's smallest barista mouse, and the cat Gusto.
Brew drip coffee with beans from Gusto's own roastery.
The aromatic smell of coffee will attract cats to your cafe.

🎮︎ A casual idle simulation cooking game that's easy to play and simple to learn.
Leave the cute staff to their own devices to work hard brewing coffee.
The showcase will automatically fill with freshly baked donuts.
Install new tools such as espresso machines, ovens, and more, and add cakes and other items to the menu.

🐱 Serve coffee to cat customers
Treat cat customers to heart-melting hot coffee and sweet treats.
Make sure they like your cafe and become regulars.
Enjoy additional stories of your regulars along with their daily or special menu orders on Catbook, the feline social network.

🍩 Cute part-timers working hard to create your menu items
Watch as cute little mice scurry around making espressos, lattes, and other drinks and desserts.
Set up various rest areas, like a bathhouse, and earn Cheese when staff use them.
Collect Cheese to hire more staff and grow your cafe.

🐭 30+ managers with different skills at each grade to help you run your cafe
Call in a special manager with the special delivery service.
If you're lucky, you'll get a top-tier Platinum-grade manager with 4 stars.
When you put managers in your cafe who have a good synergy with each other, your cafe will grow even faster!

🧀 Go global!
Gather a loyal customer base and harness word of mouth on social media to expand your cafe to cities like New York, Paris, Hawaii, Seoul, Tokyo, and more.
Become a global franchise brand like many you know from the human world.
With a trusted manager and well-trained part-timers, your cafe dreams will certainly come true.

🌿 Soothing cafe music
Enjoy cafe music from the developers of the global hit, Forest Island.
Listen to them and you'll feel refreshed after a tiring day or a depressing mood.

Developed by Nanali Studios
Also released on iOS

#theforeseenarcade #android #androidgameplay #androidgames #tinycafe #nanalistudios
